the multiplayer option: if it activates this configuration, the player will have a choice to give private or public multiplayer, the private choice means that he must send the invitation so that we can join this game and the public is open to all of course the creator of the game and the only one able to control the game and therefore he can ban players but also the only one able to modify information in the game.
